entries.name: Throw
entries.properties: Typical attack to throw a throwable weapon at a target. AR is DEX modified.  See weapon for range and damage.

entries.name: Fire
entries.properties: Typical attack to fire a ranged weapon. AR is DEX modified. See weapon for range and damage.

entries.name: Reload
entries.properties: Reload a ranged weapon. See weapon for action points needed to reload.

entries.name: Equip item
entries.properties:
Equip an item per free hand from your side or back.
For example, if you carry several javalins and you throw one, another must be equipped before use.

entries.name: Melee attack
entries.properties: Typical attack at a target with any melee weapon.  See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Dodge
entries.properties: Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.

entries.name: Move
entries.properties: May move 5 feet on level ground.  Difficult terrain takes 2 action points.

entries.name: Run
entries.properties: May move 30 feet on level ground and 15 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Climb
entries.properties: With a successful skillAthletics check, may climb 5 feet on reasonably climbable surfaces such as trees or cliffs.

entries.name: Jump
entries.properties:
Jump forward 5 ft or upward 3 ft while standing still; jump forward 8 ft or upward 4 ft while running.
This is for a medium creature. For every creature size large, double amount. For every creature size smaller, half amount.

entries.name: Shout command
entries.properties:
May shout up to four words as a command. Make a skillPersuasion check as needed.
Response is only possible on target's turn.

entries.name: Ask question
entries.properties: May make a one sentence inquiry to a nearby target and they may respond in one sentence. Make any check as needed.

entries.name: Use cover
entries.properties:
Requires you to be in range to full or half cover.
If maneuvering while under cover is needed to attack (e.g. going from a crouch to a stand, or spinning around a column), 1 action point is needed to get out of cover, and one to get back in cover.

entries.name: Drink
entries.properties:
Can drink or administer (to a willing target) a vial of liquid.
If target is unconscious, requires a skillSleight of hand check > 13, otherwise the liquid is not swallowed.

entries.name: Stabilize
entries.properties: Provides one death save to an unconscious target.

entries.name: Improvise
entries.properties: Explain to the DM what you want to do, and allow him to decide how and if it can be done.  Expect checks and actions to be required.

entries.name: Disengage
entries.properties:
May move without enabling an abilityOpportunity attack.
No attack action can be made on the same turn.

entries.name: Hide
entries.properties:
Must be out of the line of sight of all opponents.
Allows a skillStealth check to be made. See skillStealth for more information.

entries.name: Search
entries.properties:
Requires you to be in range to the space being searched.
Search a space for one of the following:
  • General items of interest.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for a hidden items.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for specified clues.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for hidden traps.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for hidden compartments or doors.

entries.name: Ready
entries.properties:
You may make an action, costing <= 3 action points, on any other character's turn. You may make the action in between actions of a character, but must declare you are doing so before the character begins the action.
If you perform a reaction, you lose your chance to make this special action.

entries.name: Opportunity attack
entries.properties: If an enemy that was once within reach, performs a move action to be out of reach, you may make a free melee attack against that enemy, costing <= half (round up) of your action points (at least 3).

entries.name: Grapple
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you may move the target as if slowed, and the target cannot attack.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.
If humanoid, you cannot perform any action that requires your hands while grappling.

entries.name: Shove
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you move the target 5 ft away.
If your STR check >= target's STR ST + 5, you move the target 10 ft away and the target is knocked prone.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.

entries.name: Delay
entries.properties:
For the encounter, moves your turn after the next character's turn.
This may be repeated until you reach the bottom of the initiative order

entries.name: Hilt butt
entries.properties:
Gained when a hilted weapon is equipped.
Hit target with butt end of hilt for 2 bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Block
entries.properties: Gained if armor indicates abilityBlock is possible. If dodge is negative, before adding the block's dodge modifier, set the dodge to 0. Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.

entries.name: Shield slam
entries.saving throw: T: Willpower ST >= A: 5 + STR check: not dazed.
entries.properties:
Gained if armor indicates abilityShield slam is possible.
On hit, inflict dazed.

entries.name: Attuned strength
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when STR >= 5
The melee attack DMG modifier due to STR does not exceed 5, excluding a abilityHeavy attack. abilityHeavy attack only consumes 4 action points.

entries.name: Maximum strength
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when STR = 10. You cannot gain more STR through leveling.
abilityHeavy attack only consumes 3 action points.

entries.name: Attuned dexterity
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when DEX >= 5
The melee and ranged attack DMG modifier due to DEX does not exceed 5. abilityReload consumes 1 less action point.

entries.name: Maximum dexterity
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when DEX = 10. You cannot gain more DEX through leveling.
abilityReload consumes 2 less action points.

entries.name: Attuned influence
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when INF >= 5
Spells that cost >= 5 mana cost 1 less mana.
Spell ST +2

entries.name: Maximum influence
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when INF = 10. You cannot gain more INF through leveling.
Spells that cost >= 5 mana cost 2 less mana.
Spell ST +4

entries.name: Attuned wisdom
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when WIS >= 5
Add 3 skill points among any skills.

entries.name: Maximum wisdom
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when WIS = 10. You cannot gain more WIS through leveling.
Add 10 skill points among any skills.

entries.name: Nightvision
entries.properties: See into darkness colorblind, but brightness is as if it were day.

entries.name: Dimvision
entries.properties: See into dim light as if it were day.

entries.name: Blinding light
entries.properties: Disadvantage on any skillPerception check and AR in bright light.

entries.name: Blind
entries.properties: Cannot see, and fails all vision-based skillPerception checks.

entries.name: Deaf
entries.properties: Cannot hear, and fails all vision-based skillPerception checks.

entries.name: Tremorsense
entries.properties: Can pinpoint any movement on the ground, and vaguely perceive size and shape.

entries.name: Thin skin
entries.properties: +8 armor.

entries.name: Half move
entries.properties: May move 5 feet on level ground.  Difficult terrain takes 4 action points.

entries.name: Double move
entries.properties: May move 10 feet on level ground or 5 feet on difficult terrian.

entries.name: Half run
entries.properties: May move 20 feet on level ground and 10 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Fast run
entries.properties: May move 40 feet on level ground and 20 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Double run
entries.properties: May move 60 feet on level ground and 30 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Natural climber
entries.properties:
May climb 5 feet on reasonably climbable surfaces such as trees or cliffs. Otherwise, +4 skillAthletics when climbing.
If creature has abilityHalf move instead of abilityMove, 2 action points are required.

entries.name: Spider climb
entries.properties: May climb 5 feet on almost any non-slick surface, even ceilings.

entries.name: Web walker
entries.properties: May ignore any movement restrictions caused by webbing and can sense the location of any other creature in contact with the web.

entries.name: Swim
entries.properties: May swim through water with submerged condition.

entries.name: Fly
entries.properties: May fly 10-15 feet through unobstructed air. Must fly each turn to avoid falling.

entries.name: Hover
entries.properties:
May fly 5 feet through unobstructed air.
Cannot move more than 30 feet above ground.

entries.name: Dig
entries.properties: May dig 5 feet through soft ground.

entries.name: Fast dig
entries.properties: May dig 5 feet through soft ground. Hard ground takes 4 action points.

entries.name: Breathe water
entries.properties: Breathes underwater as if it were open air.

entries.name: Hold breath
entries.properties: Can hold breath for 20 minutes without penalty.

entries.name: Sufficating air
entries.properties: Cannot breathe open air (same effect as if creature was holding breath underwater).

entries.name: Natural swimmer
entries.properties: Submerged condition does not apply.

entries.name: Bite
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR, and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0.

entries.name: Infect with death
entries.saving throw: Willpower 12 ST: disease does not transmit or if disease has been transmitted, it does not reduce HP maximum this day.
entries.properties: Transfers disease. At dawn of each day, the target reduces his HP maximum by 5. If his HP maximum drops to 0 or below, the target becomes a zombie. The disease can be cured with spellRemove disease or spellRemove curse.

entries.name: Bite of death
entries.saving throw: Willpower 12 ST: disease does not transmit or if disease has been transmitted, it does not reduce HP maximum this day.
entries.properties:
A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR, and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0.
Transfers disease on bite. At dawn of each day, the target reduces his HP maximum by 5. If his HP maximum drops to 0 or below, the target becomes a zombie. The disease can be cured with spellRemove disease or spellRemove curse.

entries.name: Scratch of death
entries.saving throw: Willpower 12 ST: disease does not transmit or if disease has been transmitted, it does not reduce HP maximum this day.
entries.properties:
A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0.
Transfers disease on bite. At dawn of each day, the target reduces his HP maximum by 5. If his HP maximum drops to 0 or below, the target becomes a zombie. The disease can be cured with spellRemove disease or spellRemove curse.

entries.name: Kick
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0.

entries.name: Punch
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0.

entries.name: Pounce
entries.properties: On hit, target is knocked prone and is grappled.

entries.name: Slam
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR, and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0.

entries.name: Double slam
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR, and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0. StAttack two seperate targets each for DMG.

entries.name: Triple slam
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR, and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0. Attack three seperate targets each for DMG.

entries.name: Sting
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0 piercing DMG and 1 poison DMG.

entries.name: Venomous strike
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 0 piercing DMG and 3 poison DMG.

entries.name: Claw
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 1.

entries.name: Spit
entries.properties: On hit, target is blinded until 10 skillWillpower check.

entries.name: Gore
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack. DMG is modified by STR, and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 3.

entries.name: Bull rush
entries.properties: Must continously move at least 15 feet straight towards target. Deals an extra +3 DMG added to any piercing or bludgeoning DMG.

entries.name: Trample
entries.saving throw: DEX 15 ST: half DMG and not knocked prone.
entries.properties: A melee unarmed attack which allows movement up to 20 feet without enabling an abilityOpportunity attack and knocking all targets prone. DMG is modified by STR or DEX (whichever is higher), and the base DMG varies. If no DMG is given, default is 3.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries.saving throw:
Perception 13 ST: Realize it is mimicry.
If mimicry is detected, target can perform an additional skillNature or skillArcana check to determine actual source of sound.
entries.properties: Can mimic simple sounds.

entries.name: Long reach
entries.properties: Increases the reach of specified abilities to 15 ft.

entries.name: Camouflage
entries.properties: While not performing any action, requires +7 to a normal skillPerception check to be noticed.

entries.name: Feign inanimated
entries.properties: While not performing any action, requires +7 to a normal skillPerception check to detect that creature is not dead or not inanimate.

entries.name: Pack tactics
entries.properties: While an alert ally is within 10 ft, have advantage on AR.

entries.name: Flying grapple
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you can move the target while flying.
You can only grapple a target < half your weight.

entries.name: Locked grapple
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check + 3
entries.properties:
On hit, you may move the target as if slowed, and the target cannot attack.
Every turn in grapple, target takes 2*(turns in grapple) force DMG.

+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.
If humanoid, you cannot perform any action that requires your hands while grappling.

entries.name: Swallow (small)
entries.properties:
On hit, small target is swallowed. Only one target can be swallowed at a time.
Target is blinded and snared, but has full cover from outside attacks and effects.
Target takes acid DMG at the start of his turn while swallowed. If no DMG is given, default is 5.
When the swallower is dead, target can escape by expending 3 action points, and exits the corpse prone.

entries.name: Swift retreat
entries.properties: Can move without provoking an abilityOpportunity attack.

entries.name: Cautious retreat
entries.properties: abilityDisengage from a single foe, allowing movement without provoking an abilityOpportunity attack.

entries.name: Two-headed
entries.properties: Each head has seperate action points: only one head controls the body.

entries.name: Winged fall
entries.properties: After falling >= 20 ft, gain abilityFly.
entries.description: Ghost-like angelic wings sprout from your back.

entries.name: Mark of the pure
entries.properties:
Area within 10 ft is bright light, area within 20 ft is dim light.
Gain +1 DMG to any melee physical attack.
entries.description: The tatoo-like marks across your body shine with bright light as your eyes glow. Fury and power surge your body.

entries.name: Smoke form
entries.properties:
Become uneffected by DMG until the start of your turn.
An exception is that force DMG against you is tripled until the start of your turn.

entries.name: Undying luck
entries.properties: If DMG would reduce your HP to <= 0, ignore that DMG and any other DMG until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Water yin and air yang
entries.properties:
Must be submerged in water (entire body, excluding head) for at least 8 hours a week or you will permanently transform into a raceTerran.
Must be entirely out of water for at least 8 hours a week or you will permanently transform into a raceTatsu.
In either case, all racial bonuses are replaced with the permanent race's.

entries.name: Form of feet and fin
entries.properties:
After one turn of being submerged in water, legs are replaced by a tail-like fin.
After one turn of being entirely out of water, the tail-like fin is replaced with legs.
During either of these transformations, you are considered prone and unable to move.
Transformation does not occur if you are wearing any leg-wear or feet-wear.

entries.name: Enraged swing
entries.properties: While performing a abilityHeavy attack, make attack against up to 3 targets all within 5 ft of you and 5 ft of eachother.

entries.name: Whirlwind swing
entries.properties: While performing a abilityHeavy attack, make attack against all creatures within 5 ft of you.

entries.name: Hard skin
entries.properties: +14 armor.

entries.name: Magicborn
entries.properties: +5 magic resist.

entries.name: Magic immune
entries.properties: +10 magic resist.

entries.name: Quick dodge
entries.properties: Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.

entries.name: Extra move
entries.properties: Have one extra action point each turn that can only be expended on movement.

entries.name: Extra move II
entries.properties: Have two extra action points each turn that can only be expended on movement.

entries.name: Standing leap
entries.properties: Jump forward 20 ft or upward 10 ft while standing still or running.

entries.name: Hard shove
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check.
entries.properties:
On hit, you move the target 15 ft away.
If your STR check >= target's STR ST + 5, you move the target 20 ft away and the target is knocked prone.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.

entries.name: Rage
entries.properties:
Couple with any single acquired rage mood: abilityRaging fury, abilityRaging guard, or abilityRaging haste.
Cannot change rage mood once selected.
Can activate only after initiative is rolled or at the DM's discretion in an enraging situation.

entries.name: Double rage
entries.properties:
Couple with any two acquired rage moods: abilityRaging fury, abilityRaging guard, or abilityRaging haste.
Cannot change rage moods once selected.
Can activate only after initiative is rolled or at the DM's discretion in an enraging situation.

entries.name: Triple rage
entries.properties:
Couple with all three rage moods: abilityRaging fury, abilityRaging guard, or abilityRaging haste.
Can activate only after initiative is rolled or at the DM's discretion in an enraging situation.

entries.name: Raging fury
entries.properties: -2 AR, +2 DMG.

entries.name: Raging guard
entries.properties: Resistance to bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing DMG.

entries.name: Raging haste
entries.properties: +3 dodge, abilityOpportunity attack against you are have disadvantage. Have one extra action point each turn that can only be expended on movement.

entries.name: Blood boil
entries.properties:
Depending on the rage mood, gain a blood token if:
  • abilityRaging fury: you deal DMG with an attack
  • abilityRaging guard: you take DMG
  • abilityRaging haste: an attack against you misses

+1 DMG per blood token.
If you gain > 10 blood tokens, remove them all and abilityRage ends.

entries.name: Heated blood boil
entries.properties:
When abilityRage is activated, gain 3 blood tokens.
Depending on the rage mood, gain a blood token if:
  • abilityRaging fury: you deal DMG with an attack
  • abilityRaging guard: you take DMG
  • abilityRaging haste: an attack against you misses

+1 DMG per blood token.
If you gain > 10 blood tokens, remove them all and abilityRage ends.

entries.name: Unstoppable fever
entries.properties:
You are immune to all DMG types and automatically succeed any ST.
Can only be activated by consuming >= 8 blood tokens.
Once activated, remove all blood tokens and abilityRage ends.
Lasts for 2 turns if 8 blood tokens were consumed, 3 turns if 9 blood tokens were consumed, 4 turns if 10 blood tokens were consumed.

entries.name: Murderous fever
entries.properties:
Your next successful attack will deal extra DMG to a single target.
Can only be activated by consuming >= 8 blood tokens.
Once activated, remove all blood tokens and abilityRage ends.
Deal +40 DMG if 8 blood tokens were consumed, deal +60 DMG if 8 blood tokens were consumed, deal +80 DMG if 8 blood tokens were consumed.

entries.name: Beserker fever
entries.properties:
Once activated, at the end of each turn remove a blood token.
You cannot gain additional blood tokens during this time.
Once all blood tokens are removed, abilityRage ends.

entries.name: Restoring blood
entries.properties: Restore 5 + skillWillpower modifier HP.

entries.name: Stubborn blood
entries.properties: Reroll a failed ST.

entries.name: Guided attack
entries.properties: Add 1d20 to an AR before rolling the AR.

entries.name: Perfect attack
entries.properties: Add 20 to an AR before rolling the AR.

entries.name: Honed critical
entries.properties: Critical hit on the d20 roll of 19 or 20 for the AR.

entries.name: Melee weapon specialist
entries.properties: +2 DMG with melee weapons

entries.name: Ranged weapon specialist
entries.properties: +2 DMG with ranged weapons

entries.name: Melee weapon master
entries.properties: +5 DMG with melee weapons

entries.name: Ranged weapon master
entries.properties: +5 DMG with ranged weapons

entries.name: Mastered critical
entries.properties: Critical hit on the d20 roll of 18-20 for the AR.

entries.name: Advance lunge
entries.properties:
While performing a movement action into reach of a target, may perform a abilityQuick attack without using action points.
Cannot perform with a abilityCharge attack action.

entries.name: Reactive movement
entries.properties: Can perform a single movement action as a reaction per round.

entries.name: Oportunist
entries.properties: Add 2 action points to the free melee attack action enabled by an abilityOpportunity attack.

entries.name: Adrenaline rush
entries.properties: Gain 5 action points this turn.

entries.name: Hold rank
entries.saving throw: T: Athletics ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
When you could perform an abilityOpportunity attack, instead prevent the enemy from being able to move past you.
Enemy's move action would still expend his action points.

entries.name: Intimdating attack
entries.saving throw: T: Willpower ST >= A: Intimidation check
entries.properties: After a successful melee attack, target is feared.

entries.name: Disarming strike
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit with a melee weapon equipped, the target drops his dominant hand weapon at his feet.
If your STR check >= target's STR ST + 5, the target drops his dominant hand weapon 10 ft away in a random direction.

entries.name: Trip attack
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties: After a successful melee attack, target is knocked prone.

entries.name: Provoke attack
entries.saving throw: T: Willpower ST >= A: Intimidation check
entries.properties: After a successful melee attack, provoke the target to attack you during its next turn.

entries.name: Provoke cluster
entries.saving throw: T: Willpower ST >= A: Intimidation check
entries.properties: Provoke all non-friendly creatures in area to attack you during their next 1d4 turns.

entries.name: Chronoshift
entries.properties:
Give the remaining action points of your turn to a willing target, you may not perform any reactions this round. The target must immediately use those action points.
No reaction can be made against the target's attacks.
Any DEX based ST made against that target's attacks automatically fail.
entries.description: Your body stiffens as it temporarily freezes in time.  An ally is given that time as he strikes with infinite speed.

entries.name: Natural drunk
entries.properties: If completely sober (6 hours without drinking alcohol), -2 to DEX and INF and all DEX and INF skills. If drunk, instead: -2 to WIS and all WIS skills for 1d6 hours. Otherwise (i.e. tipsy), +1 to DEX and all DEX skills.

entries.name: Gunsmith
entries.properties: Able to create gun ammunitionCartridges and modify firearms with attachments. If checks are needed, perform as DEX check.

entries.name: Duel weapons
entries.properties:
Able to add DMG provided from the offhand weapon with a abilityMelee attack or abilityQuick attack of the dominant hand weapon.
Offhand weapon must be able to perform a abilityQuick attack.

entries.name: Sharpshooter
entries.properties: +2 to AR of any ranged weapon.

entries.name: Shield adept
entries.properties: +1 to dodge given by abilityBlock.

entries.name: Quick attack
entries.properties: Attack at a target with a melee weapon. Weapon must indicate such an attack is possible. See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Rapid attack
entries.properties: Attack at a target with a melee weapon. All other attacks within this turn must be made on same target. Weapon must indicate such an attack is possible. See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Heavy attack
entries.properties: Attack at a target with a melee weapon. Weapon must indicate such an attack is possible. See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Reach attack
entries.properties: Attack at a target with a two-handed melee weapon. Weapon must indicate such an attack is possible. See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Charge attack
entries.properties: Attack at a target with a piercing melee or two-handed melee weapon. Must continously move at least 15 feet straight towards target. If no DMG is given, deals an extra +3 damage added to the weapon's typical melee damage.

entries.name: Skin
entries.properties: +10 armor.

entries.name: Thick skin
entries.properties: +12 armor.

entries.name: Nimble
entries.properties: +2 dodge.

entries.name: Rogue nimble
entries.properties: +5 dodge.

entries.name: Armored mage
entries.properties: Remove 2 from an armor-based spell AR penalty.

entries.name: Armored battlemage
entries.properties: Remove 4 from an armor-based spell AR penalty.

entries.name: Magic resistant
entries.properties: +2 magic resist.

entries.name: Side step
entries.properties: When dodging results in a miss, may move 5 ft without cost to action points and without enabling an abilityOpportunity attack from that attacker.

entries.name: Moving dodge
entries.properties: +5 dodge against an abilityOpportunity attack.

entries.name: Parry
entries.properties: When a melee weapon is equipped, dodge +2.

entries.name: Counter attack
entries.properties: When dodging, if attacker's AR+5 would miss, no action points lost for the dodge. Additionally, gain a counter attack point.  On your next turn, you may expend a counter attack point to have advantage on that attack.

entries.name: Link to Sentium drone
entries.properties:
You gain a mental link to a Sentium drone that you can call into existence from the Sentium plane.
The drone is powered by the essence of your arcaneSoul shard, and you are known as its summoner. The drone will regain hit-points, mana, and abilities when your shard is drained. If the drone is destroyed, it requires 8 hours of focus to recall it from the Sentium plane. When recalled, it loses all items and conditions it was carrying, but is otherwise fully rejuvenate.
The drone is controlled by expending your action points. A drone will do nothing unless it is controlled; however, it will try to remain in a stable position and it will make ST as needed.
When controlling the drone, you gain insight through the drone's senses, without limiting your own perception. The drone's senses include: sight, sound, and touch. Drones cannot communicate verbally, but can, in circumstances determined by the GM, feel and express emotion.
When the drone extends out of range, the link is lost and you are unable to control or sense the drone. The drone will fade into the Sentium plane within 8 hours, but you may begin the recall at any time after you lose the link. You may recall a drone, even if it is not destroyed or out of range. In this case, the drone unlinks and the process works just as if the drone extended out of range.

entries.name: Construct mecha drone
entries.properties: Your Sentium drone is a classMecha drone. When you level, the drone will level with you and you may pick its attributes.

entries.name: Construct drone swarm
entries.properties: Your Sentium drone is a classDrone swarm. When you level, the drone will level with you and you may pick its attributes.

entries.name: Follow summoner
entries.properties:
Expend an entire turn's action points. You move 30 feet each turn towards your summoner in the most direct path of least danger. You continue to move until you are within 10 feet of your summoner, or if your summoner moves more than 10 feet away from you.
This ability does not consume any additional action points until it is canceled or a different action is taken.

entries.name: Metal carapace
entries.properties: +12 armor, +8 magic resist.

entries.name: Remote senses
entries.properties:
Use the summoner's skill points when making an:
  • skillArcana check
  • skillPerception check
  • skillInspection check
  • skillInsight check
  • skillLore check
  • skillNature check
  • skillSurvival check

entries.name: Mechanized arm
entries.properties:
Gain a mechanical arm with a simple claw-like hand. Can be used to perform simple tasks, such as:
  • Picking up an object, weighing < 50 lbs.
  • Throwing a small object up to 25 feet
  • Shoving an object with 50 lbs of force.
  • Clenching an object with 10 lbs of force.

entries.name: Propulsive wallop
entries.properties: A melee attack from a mechanized arm.

entries.name: Electric prod
entries.properties: An attack from a mechanized arm.

entries.name: Song of the weave
entries.properties:
At the start of the next turn, you begin a song. A song can last for as long as it is played or sung. The song can be accompanied with a Motif and is set to a abilityTime signature.
The song is played with one beat equaling one turn. A beat is an ability that can only be performed during a song. Beats have one of four types:
  • Sharp
  • Flat
  • Natural
  • Rest
Beats are played in a Measure, depending on the abilityTime signature. Certain beats can only be played if they follow a particular beat type, or fall at a particular point in the measure.
A measure is a pattern of a particular number of beats, determined by the chosen abilityTime signature for the song. For example, if a 4/4 measure is chosen, every four beats the measure starts over. The song needs to be carefully considered to ensure it maintains proper rhythm and theme. Playing the right beats in sequence can provide bonuses. If a beat is not played on a turn, the turn is considered a Rest. If two rests are played in sequence, the song is ended early.
If a song is ended early, you must use abilityTemperament to begin the next song. Certain Composition dynamics like abilityOutro can end a song properly instead of early. If a song is ended properly, the next song can begin by using this ability.

entries.name: Time signature
entries.properties:
The time signature determines how many beats are in a measure. A measure starts over after the last beat in the measure. Certain time signatures are gained at certain levels:
  • At level 1 gain the 4/4 measure: 4 beats per measure
  • At level 1 gain the 4/4 measure: 4 beats per measure
  • At level 4 gain the 3/4 measure: 3 beats per measure
  • At level 10 gain the 2/4 measure: 2 beats per measure
  • At level 14 gain the 6/8 measure: 6 beats per measure
Once a time signature is chosen for the song, it cannot be changed.

entries.name: Temperament
entries.properties: Take two whole turns preparing for the next song by retuning your instrument or relaxing your vocal chords. After Temperament, abilitySong of the weave can be performed again. Temperament is only performed when required (see abilitySong of the weave for more details).

entries.name: Outro
entries.properties: Can only be activated during the last beat of the measure.  If activated, the next measure will be the last measure of the song, and the song will end properly.

entries.name: Capriccio
entries.properties:
A quick, improvisational, spirited composition.
All allies within the song's range gain abilityExtra move. Any ally that already has abilityExtra move gains abilityExtra move II instead. All allies also gain +2 to skillAthletic checks.

entries.name: Accompaniment
entries.properties: +2 to DMG or healing to beats if playing a two-handed instrument during a song.

entries.name: Grazioso
entries.properties:
A gracefully composition.
All allies within the song's range gain +1 AR. All allies also gain +2 to skillBalance checks.

entries.name: Soundwave
entries.properties:
+1 AR for every preceding beat in the measure.
+2 DMG if following a Rest.

entries.name: Healing words
entries.properties: +3 healing if the 3rd beat in the measure.
